MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-NOV-2020 10:04.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:12am. Our engineers have arrived at the Edinburgh Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:04am on Thursday, 19 November 2020
